page.title: 04Recreation 2
page.content:
Tennis Courts -------------- Cults Tennis Club was formed some time ago.There are 6 courts and a big clubhouse.In the mornings the clubhouse is used as a nursey.There are minileagues and championships. There are games between other tennis clubs.The courts are situated behind Cults hotel and the North East of Scotland championships are held there every August.
BMX Track ---------- The BMX track is situated near Cults Primary School and was built in 1982. It is meant for BMX bicycles,but the local teenagers use their motorcycles on it.It was designed by Stewart Duncan.
